Tuesday.name: Acroyoga
notes: Whilst Jo is away, this session is a freestyle jam session for the Acro Yogi die hards. Please feel free to attend if you are one of the regulars or know one of the regulars.
There is no charge for the session, but you may leave a donation for use of the space, if you feel inclined. :)
